sjc.symboltable

Class SymbolTableBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • sjc.symboltable.SymbolTableBuilder

  • public class SymbolTableBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to build symbol table for a StaticJava CompilationUnit. Note that the algorithm assumes that the JDT AST tree was built using the StaticJavaASTParser or StaticJavaASTAltParser. That is, it assumes certain structures on the AST, e.g., a class does not have an instance method.
    Author:
    Robby

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SymbolTableBuilder.Error
      This class is used to signal an error in the process of building a symbol table.

      • build

        public static SymbolTable build(CompilationUnit cu)

        Builds a SymbolTable for the given StaticJava CompilationUnit.

        Returns:

        Throws:
